law.catch_line: A majority of the voting members shall constitute a quorum for:...

section.section:
A majority of the voting members shall constitute a quorum for:
the transaction of any business; or
the exercise of any power or the performance of any duty authorized or imposed by law.
No formal action may be taken by the Board without the approval of a majority of the voting members of the Board.

text.section: The Board shall set the times and places of its meetings.

An appointed member of the Board is entitled to:
the compensation provided in the State budget; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
